[{'description': "

Experience the thrill of driving with this 2022 Mazda CX-5 GS AWD, featuring a 2.5L 4-cylinder engine and an automatic transmission. This vehicle delivers a balanced and responsive performance, with its all-wheel-drive system ensuring enhanced traction and stability in various driving conditions. The CX-5's engine provides a smooth and efficient ride, making it an excellent choice for both urban and adventurous drives.
 
Step inside to discover a cabin designed for comfort and convenience. The CX-5 GS AWD boasts a spacious interior with high-quality materials, providing a luxurious feel for both driver and passengers. The supportive seats and well-organized controls ensure a comfortable ride, while the generous cargo space accommodates all your gear and belongings with ease.
 
This 2022 Mazda CX-5 GS AWD combines dynamic performance with a refined interior and sleek blue exterior. With only 29,324 kilometers, it is in excellent condition and ready to deliver a high-quality driving experience. This SUV offers a perfect blend of style, comfort, and capability for your everyday and adventure needs.

No Obligation Pre-Approvals within 2 hours from the Comfort of Your Home!! Apply Online @ **********

[{'description': "
 
Reduced $2,000! CX-5GS AWD withApple CarPlay,Dual Zone Climate,Heated Seats and Wheel andKeyless Entry + Start!
 
The 2020 Mazda CX-5 GS AWD is powered by a 2.5L 4-cylinder engine paired with an automatic transmission, offering a refined and dynamic driving experience. This engine delivers a robust blend of power and efficiency, ensuring smooth acceleration and excellent handling. The all-wheel-drive system enhances traction and stability, making the CX-5 well-equipped to handle a variety of driving conditions with confidence.
 
Inside, the CX-5 GS AWD features a stylish and comfortable cabin designed to provide a premium driving experience. The interior is crafted with high-quality materials and includes supportive seating, modern technology, and intuitive controls. With generous passenger space and a versatile cargo area, the CX-5 is ideal for both everyday use and longer trips.
 
In summary, the 2020 Mazda CX-5 GS AWD combines impressive performance with a luxurious and practical interior. Its elegant white exterior adds a touch of sophistication, making it a standout choice for those seeking a well-rounded SUV that excels in both comfort and capability.
 
Only $24,998 or $114/Wk Tax Inc $0 Down! Email ********** for more info!

[{'description': "Advanced Blind Spot Monitoring , Rear Cross Traffic Alert, Rearview Camera and more!
 
Clutch is the largest online used car retailer in Canada, delivering a seamless, hassle-free car-buying experience to drivers everywhere. Shop hundreds of used cars online, get the right one delivered to your door, and enjoy peace of mind with our optional 10-Day Money-Back Guarantee. How sweet is that? To learn more, visit clutch.ca.
 
The top features for this 2019 Mazda CX-5 include:
 
Advanced Blind Spot Monitoring
Rear Cross Traffic Alert
Rearview Camera
7 Touchscreen Display
Power Driver's Seat
Push Button Start
Steering Wheel Mounted Audio
Lane Departure Warning System
 
Seamless home delivery - Delivery anywhere in Nova Scotia, anywhere on PEI, and East of Fredericton, New Brunswick. Available on select packages.
 
Try it out for 10 days - If you do not like it, we will take it back. Available on select packages.
 
Quality assured - Rigorous 210-point inspection and reconditioning process.
 
Peace of mind - Optional 3-month Standard Warranty, with additional warranty options available. Plus, every Clutch car comes with a 2-year MVI.
 
Haggle-free - No haggling or hard sells.
 
100% Transparency - Full inspection reports on every car, including high-res photography and a free Carfax report.
 
Listed price is for cash purchase only and does not include taxes, Shipping Fees (if applicable), Delivery Fees (if applicable), government licensing fees. 10-day Money Back Guarantee, 3-month Standard Warranty, and home delivery are available with select packages.
 
Previous Provincial Registrations:
Quebec
 
Stock # 35921 

Warranty:
This vehicle's manufacturer warranty has expired."}]

[{'description': 'Recent Arrival!

Red 2017 Mazda CX-5 GS 6-Speed Automatic SKYACTIV 2.5L 4-Cylinder DOHC 16V AWD

FRESH OIL LUBE FILTER, CARSON EXPORTS EXCELLENCE INSPECTION, FRESH 2 YEAR MVI.

Our professional and knowledgeable Sales Advisors are here to help you with a no pressure approach to finding your next vehicle. Carson Exports is known for being the best place to buy an used car. Period. and we live by that statement. We would love to see you and show you how we do things differently. Drop by and visit us, take a test drive, have a coffee or our famous hot chocolate, and take a tour of our showrooms at 550 and 560 Windmill Road to view The Carson Collection. Our finance team is the best in the business. We will help you find the best financing solution available for your personal circumstances. We take our professional and legal responsibility very seriously when it comes to ensuring you know all of the options available to you for the financing and protection of your investment.

Reviews:
  * The Mazda CX-5 is highly rated for looking and feeling more expensive than it is. Since its introduction, this model has been sought-after by shoppers looking for an up-level crossover driving experience without the up-level price tag. On all elements of styling, handling, and dynamics, owners seem to be impressed. Source: autoTRADER.ca '}]

Clutch is the largest online used car retailer in Canada, delivering a seamless, hassle-free car-buying experience to drivers everywhere. Shop hundreds of used cars online, get the right one delivered to your door, and enjoy peace of mind with our optional 10-Day Money-Back Guarantee. How sweet is that? To learn more, visit clutch.ca.

Apple CarPlay & Android Auto

High Beam Control
Hill Launch Assist
Power Heated Mirrors
Automatic On/Off Headlights
A/C
LED Headlights
 
Seamless home delivery - Delivery anywhere in Nova Scotia, anywhere on PEI, and East of Fredericton, New Brunswick. Available on select packages.
 
Try it out for 10 days - If you do not like it, we will take it back. Available on select packages.
 
Quality assured - Rigorous 210-point inspection and reconditioning process.

 
Peace of mind - Optional 3-month Standard Warranty, with additional warranty options available. Plus, every Clutch car comes with a 2-year MVI.
 
Haggle-free - No haggling or hard sells.
 
100% Transparency - Full inspection reports on every car, including high-res photography and a free Carfax report.
 
Listed price is for cash purchase only and does not include taxes, Shipping Fees (if applicable), Delivery Fees (if applicable), government licensing fees. 10-day Money Back Guarantee, 3-month Standard Warranty, and home delivery are available with select packages.
 
Previous Provincial Registrations:
Ontario
 
Stock # 34341 

Warranty:
This vehicle has only 12 months and unlimited kilometres of warranty left.'}]

description: [{'description': "The 2022 Mazda CX-5 GS is a well-rounded compact SUV that strikes an excellent balance between style, comfort, and performance. Positioned as a mid-tier trim in the CX-5 lineup, the GS model offers a range of features that enhance the driving experience without compromising on Mazda's signature design and driving dynamics. Under the hood, the CX-5 GS is powered by a 2.5-liter naturally aspirated inline-4 engine that produces 187 horsepower and 186 lb-ft of torque. This engine is paired with a 6-speed automatic transmission, delivering smooth shifts and responsive acceleration. The i-Activ all-wheel-drive system is standard on the 2022 model, providing enhanced traction and stability in various driving conditions, whether on wet roads or light off-road terrain. The exterior design of the CX-5 GS features Mazda's elegant Kodo design language, with a bold front grille, sleek LED headlights, and a sculpted body that exudes a sense of motion even when standing still. The 17-inch alloy wheels and subtle chrome accents add to the vehicle's refined appearance. Inside, the CX-5 GS offers a comfortable and well-crafted cabin with seating for five passengers. The interior is equipped with premium cloth upholstery, a leather-wrapped steering wheel, and heated front seats. The driver's seat is power-adjustable, making it easy to find the perfect driving position. The 10.25-inch infotainment display is controlled via a rotary dial and offers Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, Bluetooth connectivity, and a 6-speaker audio system. The CX-5 GS also comes with a comprehensive suite of safety features, including blind-spot monitoring, rear cross-traffic alert, advanced smart city brake support, and adaptive cruise control with stop-and-go functionality. The vehicle's advanced safety technology and solid build quality contribute to its top safety ratings, ensuring peace of mind for both the driver and passengers. Overall, the 2022 Mazda CX-5 GS is an attractive option for those seeking a compact SUV that combines stylish design, a comfortable interior, and engaging driving dynamics, all with the practicality and reliability that Mazda is known for. description: [{'description': "The 2023 Mazda CX-5 Sport Design Turbo AWD embodies the perfect fusion of style, performance, and versatility, setting a new standard in the compact SUV segment. With its sleek and dynamic design, this vehicle captures attention on both urban streets and rugged terrains. At first glance, the exterior of the CX-5 Sport Design Turbo AWD exudes confidence and sophistication. Its bold lines and sculpted curves create a sense of movement even when the vehicle is at a standstill. The signature Mazda grille, adorned with chrome accents, adds a touch of elegance while emphasizing the vehicle's sporty demeanor. LED headlights and taillights provide exceptional visibility and enhance the overall modern aesthetic. Step inside, and you'll find a cabin designed with meticulous attention to detail. Premium materials, such as soft-touch surfaces and available leather upholstery, create an inviting environment for both driver and passengers. The spacious interior offers ample room for five occupants, along with versatile cargo space to accommodate all your gear and belongings. The centerpiece of the CX-5 Sport Design Turbo AWD is its advanced technology features. A user-friendly infotainment system, complete with a touchscreen display, seamlessly integrates with your smartphone through Apple CarPlay and Android Auto, keeping you connected and entertained on every journey. Additionally, an array of driver-assistance features, including adaptive cruise control and lane-keeping assist, provides an extra layer of safety and peace of mind. Under the hood, the CX-5 Sport Design Turbo AWD packs a punch with its turbocharged engine, delivering exhilarating performance and responsive handling. The all-wheel-drive system ensures optimal traction and stability, whether navigating through challenging weather conditions or exploring off-road trails. With its winning combination of style, performance, and technology, the 2023 Mazda CX-5 Sport Design Turbo AWD redefines what it means to drive a compact SUV, offering an unforgettable driving experience that exceeds expectations. Priced @ only $38,696! $700 finance credit when financed here through the bank of your choice! 120 POINT MECHANICAL INSPECTION! FRESH OIL SERVICE! 4 WHEEL ALIGNMENT! NEW NS SAFETY STICKER! PROFESSIONALLY DETAILED! CALL OR TEXT ********** NOW FOR YOUR QUICK AND EASY PRE APPROVAL OR TO BOOK YOUR TEST DRIVE! TRURO MAZDA PROMISE At Truro Mazda we treat our customers like family. That is why every single one of our pre-owned vehicles goes through our extensive 120 point mechanical inspection. In addition, we provide EASY FINANCING with guaranteed approvals for every financial situation whether it be perfect credit, bankruptcy, slow payment, collections, etc. We have the GUARANTEED BEST VALUE on all of our vehicles and will DELIVER ANY VEHICLE FREE OF CHARGE ALL OVER ATLANTIC CANADA! Make your next car buying experience an awesome one by calling Truro Mazda NOW at ********** or TEXT ********** available 24 hours a day, seven days a week! We look forward to meeting you! In just 3 short years Truro Mazda has become a major destination for Pre Owned vehicles shoppers in the Central and Northern Nova Scotia area. Come in today to see why our customers love us. "}]

description: [{'description': "The 2022 Mazda CX-5 Sport Design brings a blend of sophistication and athleticism to the compact SUV segment. With its non-turbocharged engine and all-wheel drive capability, it's engineered to deliver a dynamic driving experience while maintaining efficiency and versatility. Exterior design cues showcase Mazda's signature Kodo design language, characterized by sleek lines and a sense of motion even when standing still. The Sport Design trim adds distinctive touches such as black exterior accents, giving it a sporty and modern appearance that stands out on the road. Step inside, and you're greeted by a thoughtfully crafted interior that prioritizes comfort and functionality. Premium materials and attention to detail create an inviting atmosphere for both driver and passengers. The cabin offers ample space for five occupants and versatile cargo storage options to accommodate various needs, whether it's a weekend getaway or daily commuting. Technological innovation is seamlessly integrated throughout the CX-5 Sport Design. An intuitive infotainment system with a responsive interface provides access to navigation, entertainment, and connectivity features. Advanced safety technologies, including adaptive cruise control, lane departure warning, and automatic emergency braking, offer peace of mind on every journey. Under the hood, the 2.5L engine delivers a balance of power and efficiency, providing smooth acceleration and confident performance in various driving conditions. Paired with Mazda's i-Activ all-wheel drive system, the CX-5 Sport Design ensures optimal traction and stability, whether you're navigating city streets or venturing off the beaten path. Overall, the 2022 Mazda CX-5 Sport Design combines stylish design, advanced technology, and spirited performance to redefine what a compact SUV can be, offering a driving experience that's as exhilarating as it is practical. Priced @ only $35,696! $700 finance credit when financed here through the bank of your choice! 120 POINT MECHANICAL INSPECTION! FRESH OIL SERVICE! 4 WHEEL ALIGNMENT! NEW NS SAFETY STICKER! PROFESSIONALLY DETAILED! CALL OR TEXT ********** NOW FOR YOUR QUICK AND EASY PRE APPROVAL OR TO BOOK YOUR TEST DRIVE! TRURO MAZDA PROMISE At Truro Mazda we treat our customers like family. That is why every single one of our pre-owned vehicles goes through our extensive 120 point mechanical inspection. In addition, we provide EASY FINANCING with guaranteed approvals for every financial situation whether it be perfect credit, bankruptcy, slow payment, collections, etc. We have the GUARANTEED BEST VALUE on all of our vehicles and will DELIVER ANY VEHICLE FREE OF CHARGE ALL OVER ATLANTIC CANADA! Make your next car buying experience an awesome one by calling Truro Mazda NOW at ********** or TEXT ********** available 24 hours a day, seven days a week! We look forward to meeting you! In just 3 short years Truro Mazda has become a major destination for Pre Owned vehicles shoppers in the Central and Northern Nova Scotia area. Come in today to see why our customers love us. "}]

description:
[{'description': "NO ACCIDENTS / CLEAN CARFAX / 1 OWNER / Advanced Blind Spot Monitoring , Keyless Entry, Rear Cross Traffic Alert and more!
 
Clutch is the largest online used car retailer in Canada, delivering a seamless, hassle-free car-buying experience to drivers everywhere. Shop hundreds of used cars online, get the right one delivered to your door, and enjoy peace of mind with our optional 10-Day Money-Back Guarantee. How sweet is that? To learn more, visit clutch.ca.
 
The top features for this 2019 Mazda CX-5 include:
 
Advanced Blind Spot Monitoring
Keyless Entry
Rear Cross Traffic Alert
6 Way Power Drivers Seat
40/20/40 Split Rear Seats
Heated Steering Wheel
Pedestrian Detection (forward sensing)
Heated Front Seats
 
Seamless home delivery - Delivery anywhere in Nova Scotia, anywhere on PEI, and East of Fredericton, New Brunswick. Available on select packages.
 
Try it out for 10 days - If you do not like it, we will take it back. Available on select packages.
 
Quality assured - Rigorous 210-point inspection and reconditioning process.
 
Peace of mind - Optional 3-month Standard Warranty, with additional warranty options available. Plus, every Clutch car comes with a 2-year MVI.
 
Haggle-free - No haggling or hard sells.
 
100% Transparency - Full inspection reports on every car, including high-res photography and a free Carfax report.
 
Listed price is for cash purchase only and does not include taxes, Shipping Fees (if applicable), Delivery Fees (if applicable), government licensing fees. 10-day Money Back Guarantee, 3-month Standard Warranty, and home delivery are available with select packages.
 
Previous Provincial Registrations:
Nova Scotia
 
Stock # 34861 

Warranty:
This vehicle's manufacturer warranty has expired."}]

description:
[{'description': '
 Wheels: 19 Alloy w/Silver Metallic Finish -inc: dark painted pockets, Trunk/Hatch Auto-Latch, Transmission: 6-Spd SKYACTIV-Drive Automatic, Transmission w/Driver Selectable Mode, Sequential Shift Control and Oil Cooler, Tires: 225/55R19 AS, Steel Spare Wheel, Side Impact Beams, Remote Releases -Inc: Power Cargo Access and Mechanical Fuel, Remote Keyless Entry w/Integrated Key Transmitter, Illuminated Entry, Illuminated Ignition Switch and Panic Button, Regular Amplifier. This Mazda CX-5 has a strong Intercooled Turbo Regular Unleaded I-4 2.5 L/152 engine powering this Automatic transmission. 
 
These Packages Will Make Your Mazda CX-5 GT The Envy of Your Friends 
 Redundant Digital Speedometer, Rear Child Safety Locks, Rain Detecting Variable Intermittent Wipers w/Heated Wiper Park, Radio: AM/FM/HD w/Bose Premium Audio -inc: 10 speakers w/Centerpoint 2 Surround Technology w/SurroundStage signal processing and Audiopilot 2 noise compensation technology, Bluetooth w/audio profile, SiriusXM Satellite Radio w/3-month subscription, steering wheel mounted audio and Bluetooth controls, 4 USB and auxiliary input jacks, 7 colour touchscreen display w/MAZDA CONNECT, Apple Carplay and Android Auto, SiriusXM Traffic Plus and Travel Link services w/5-year subscription, SMS text message functionality, Aha and Stitcher internet radio functionality, Quasi-Dual Stainless Steel Exhaust w/Chrome Tailpipe Finisher, Proximity Key For Doors And Push Button Start, Power Liftgate Rear Cargo Access, Power 1st Row Windows w/Front And Rear 1-Touch Up/Down, Perimeter/Approach Lights, Passenger Seat, Outboard Front Lap And Shoulder Safety Belts -inc: Rear Centre 3 Point, Height Adjusters and Pretensioners, Navigation System -inc: free trial, Manual Adjustable Rear Head Restraints, Low Tire Pressure Warning, LED Brakelights, Leather Upholstery, Leather Gear Shifter Material, Lane Keeping Assist, Lane Departure Warning, Interior Trim -inc: Metal-Look Instrument Panel Insert, Metal-Look Door Panel Insert and Metal-Look Interior Accents. 

 '}]

description:
[{'description': "NO ACCIDENTS / CLEAN CARFAX / Heated Steering Wheel, Heated Front Seats, Power Liftgate and more!
 
Clutch is the largest online used car retailer in Canada, delivering a seamless, hassle-free car-buying experience to drivers everywhere. Shop hundreds of used cars online, get the right one delivered to your door, and enjoy peace of mind with our optional 10-Day Money-Back Guarantee. How sweet is that? To learn more, visit clutch.ca.
 
The top features for this 2021 Mazda CX-5 include:
 
Heated Steering Wheel
Heated Front Seats
Power Liftgate
Rearview Camera
Heated Side Mirrors
Rain Sensing Windshield Wipers
6 Speakers
Auto Dimming Rearview Mirror
 
Seamless home delivery - Delivery anywhere in Nova Scotia, anywhere on PEI, and East of Fredericton, New Brunswick. Available on select packages.
 
Try it out for 10 days - If you do not like it, we will take it back. Available on select packages.
 
Quality assured - Rigorous 210-point inspection and reconditioning process.
 
Peace of mind - Optional 3-month Standard Warranty, with additional warranty options available. Plus, every Clutch car comes with a 2-year MVI.
 
Haggle-free - No haggling or hard sells.
 
100% Transparency - Full inspection reports on every car, including high-res photography and a free Carfax report.
 
Listed price is for cash purchase only and does not include taxes, Shipping Fees (if applicable), Delivery Fees (if applicable), government licensing fees. 10-day Money Back Guarantee, 3-month Standard Warranty, and home delivery are available with select packages.
 
Previous Provincial Registrations:
Ontario
 
Stock # 34760 

Warranty:
This vehicle's manufacturer warranty has expired."}]

description:
[{'description': "The Ford Certified Pre-Owned Program is a philosophy of selling the absolute best pre-owned Ford vehicles in the marketplace. To qualify for this program, each eligible Ford Pre-Owned vehicle must pass a rigorous inspection completed by factory-trained technicians. The inspection covers the powertrain, chassis, amenities and the overall condition of the vehicle before it can be officially certified. At the foundation of the Ford Certified Pre-Owned Program is a comprehensive package of services and benefits that will give you confidence and peace-of-mind in your purchase. 6-month/10,000 Km Comprehensive Limited Warranty Coverage* (Covering over 1,000 items) 172-Point Inspection by factory-trained technicians 24-Hour Roadside Assistance** Fully transferable Warranty The assurance of a clean CarProof report Fresh oil and filter New wiper blades A full tank of fuel Sirius XM 3 months prepaid subscription Canadian Black Book Best Pick.


2019 Mazda CX-5 GS Blue SKYACTIV 2.5L 4-Cylinder DOHC 16V 6-Speed Automatic FWD


MacPhee Ford offers many automotive products and services to our Dartmouth area customers. From quality new Ford vehicles to used cars of any make, we know anyone looking for a vehicle in or around the HRM will likely find what they're looking for at our dealership. Call MacPhee Ford at (902) 434 - 7700 or come visit us in person. We're conveniently located at 580 Portland Street in Dartmouth, NS. And we look forward to helping you with your automotive needs.


Reviews:
  * The Mazda CX-5 is highly rated for looking and feeling more expensive than it is. Since its introduction, this model has been sought-after by shoppers looking for an up-level crossover driving experience without the up-level price tag. On all elements of styling, handling, and dynamics, owners seem to be impressed. Source: autoTRADER.ca "}]

description: [{'description': "Smith and Watt is a family owned and operated Chrysler, Dodge, Jeep, Ram Dealership located in Barrington Passage offering some of the best service around since 1930's, we have a large stock of new/used inventory with competitive prices on every model on our lot.  We have on spot financing with a wide selection of different banks such as RBC, CIBC, TD, BNS, BMO, Lend Care, Scotia Dealer Advantage, etc. Our Finance manager is highly trained in all credit situations and would love to help you get approved on your next purchase from Smith and Watt Limited. 3 months FREE XM Radio on all pre-owned vehicles, 1 year free on all new vehicles. Also available is extra warranties for all makes and models. Prices listed are finance prices, cash prices are subject to change. We cant guarantee every used vehicle has 2 sets of keys, also keep in mind some used vehicles may have some scrapes small dents and dings, but we take pride in making sure all our vehicles are mechanically sound before leaving the lot to its new home. Book your appointment with us today at ********** or send in a lead and one of our friendly sales staff will get back to you as soon as they can. We offer free fresh coffee and tea along with satellite TV in our waiting room. Take a drive today and check out one of our many beautiful beaches in Barrington passage and stop by our lot along your way. "}]

description:
[{'description': "LED Headlights, Electronic Parking Brakes, Daytime Running Lights and more!
 
Clutch is the largest online used car retailer in Canada, delivering a seamless, hassle-free car-buying experience to drivers everywhere. Shop hundreds of used cars online, get the right one delivered to your door, and enjoy peace of mind with our optional 10-Day Money-Back Guarantee. How sweet is that? To learn more, visit clutch.ca.
 
The top features for this 2021 Mazda CX-5 include:
 
LED Headlights
Electronic Parking Brakes
Daytime Running Lights
Heated Steering Wheel
Apple CarPlay & Android Auto
8 Touchscreen
Power Liftgate
Bluetooth
 
Seamless home delivery - Delivery anywhere in Nova Scotia, anywhere on PEI, and East of Fredericton, New Brunswick. Available on select packages.
 
Try it out for 10 days - If you do not like it, we will take it back. Available on select packages.
 
Quality assured - Rigorous 210-point inspection and reconditioning process.
 
Peace of mind - Optional 3-month Standard Warranty, with additional warranty options available. Plus, every Clutch car comes with a 2-year MVI.
 
Haggle-free - No haggling or hard sells.
 
100% Transparency - Full inspection reports on every car, including high-res photography and a free Carfax report.
 
Listed price is for cash purchase only and does not include taxes, Shipping Fees (if applicable), Delivery Fees (if applicable), government licensing fees. 10-day Money Back Guarantee, 3-month Standard Warranty, and home delivery are available with select packages.
 
Previous Provincial Registrations:
Ontario
 
Stock # 36459 

Warranty:
This vehicle's manufacturer warranty has expired."}]
